title: WP2 - Working Paper Populator
short_description: Full-stack automation for audit working papers, cutting prep time from hours to minutes.
why_built: Manual reconciliation of audit working papers was slow and error-prone. The goal was to automate population and validation to save time and reduce mistakes.
development_approach: Iterated a Python ETL pipeline to ingest, validate, and transform spreadsheet inputs.
Built a Streamlit UI for configuration and progress monitoring.
Added export routines to generate standardized outputs and logs.

challenges.solution: Implemented schema validation and auto-mapping with fallback prompts.
Vectorized transformations and minimized I/O roundtrips.

outcomes: Reduced preparation time from 3â€“4 hours to under 5 minutes.
Improved reliability and audit traceability with logs.

title: UniExplorer
short_description: SA university program recommender based on results and preferences.
why_built: Students struggle to discover suitable programs. This tool narrows options based on results and goals.
development_approach: REST API in FastAPI for matching and scoring.
Next.js frontend with server-side rendering for fast loads.
SQLite for light-weight persistence and prototyping.

challenges.solution: Normalized criteria and exposed transparency in scoring.

outcomes: Faster decision-making and clear fit explanations.

title: AI Prompt Optimization Tool
short_description: Interactive tool to refine and test LLM prompts for better quality outputs.
why_built: Teams need a structured way to iterate on prompts and benchmark quality.
development_approach: LangChain wrappers to swap models and templates.
Streamlit UI for side-by-side comparisons and ratings.
Export baseline prompts and settings for reuse.

challenges.solution: Added rubric-based scoring and pairwise comparison views.

outcomes: Higher consistency and faster experimentation cycles.

title: Member Data Manager
short_description: Cloud-based lifecycle management with dashboards for Project Y members.
why_built: Centralize member data and track outcomes in one place.
development_approach: ETL pipelines to standardize member events.
Power BI dashboards for leadership KPIs.

challenges.solution: Unified ingestion with documented schemas and lineage.

outcomes: Single source of truth and real-time visibility.

title: Multi-Cloud Deployment
short_description: Production-grade Streamlit app deployed to AWS & Azure with unified CI/CD.
why_built: Demonstrate portable deployments across major clouds.
development_approach: Reusable CI/CD workflows targeting multiple providers.
Infra parameters extracted to env-specific configs.

title: AI Car Inspector
short_description: Web app analyzing car images to extract make, model, condition, and issues.
why_built: Reduce manual inspection time and improve consistency.
development_approach: Vision model for key attribute extraction.
